basics.name: Omar Abdelbadie
basics.label: Full-Stack SDE in Machine Learning
basics.summary:
Hi there! I am a team-oriented data engineer and developer. Having worked across the full stack of web technologies, taking applications from prototype to production, I've learned first hand the value of high-quality code, scalable architecture, and effective data integration. 

My passion lies in the applied sciences and mathematics-- structuring the (technological and psychological) pipelines that lead from data -> information -> insight -> creativity -> products -> positive impact 

In me you will find a hard worker, a quick learner, and an excellent communicator. I love tackling challenging problems with skilled teammates in a collaborative, fast-paced environment.

work.name: OneLogin by One Identity
highlights: Managed and maintained a machine learning-based Account Takeover Protection core product feature.
Designed and developed a new customer feature, collaborating with multiple teams to ensure alignment with requirements.
Acted as the primary engineering point of contact for the Ops team, providing expertise in detailed data analysis and AWS OpenSearch.
work.summary: FILL THIS IN WITH SOMETHING MEMORABLE AND POWERFUL

work.name: Flexe
highlights: Led the design and development of a new Order Management System feature, unlocking new mid-complexity customers with over 70,000 orders per month
Building and designing features for a rapidly growing product / customer base
Full-stack duties spanning a tech stack of Typescript, Ruby, and Scala
Infrastructure-as-code, microservice architecture, clean API design

work.name: Unloop
highlights: Mentorship and Education spanning full stack Javascript and Typescript Development. Python/data science on the side

work.name: MAANA
highlights: Integrate the latest and greatest AI services into the MAANA platform.
Optimized 4 AI Azure Kubernetes Microservices by implementing asynchronous calls and reducing image sizes by >70%
Streamlined customer ETL workflows by building a text annotation dashboard for custom Named Entity Recognition
Led research and design of API for External UI Integration feature
Delivered first-in-class training material for major client on proprietary data modeling platform

work.name: General Assembly
highlights: Coached 4 students through 12 weeks of homework/labs/projects in Data Science (scikit-learn, Tensorflow, spaCy), Engineering (Spark, web-scraping, AWS) and Visualization (Tableau, Seaborn).
Facilitated a 0% dropout rate and successful placement into Data Science roles.

awards.title: College & Departmental Honors
awards.summary: Completed Honors Program, as well as Undergraduate Thesis in Computational Neuroscience under Scott Murray of the UW VisCog Lab

publications.name: Smarter, Better, Faster, Longer: The Efficacy and Mechanisms of Cognitive Enhancement
publications.publisher: Grety Matters: UW Undergraduate Neuroscience Journal
publications.summary: An in-depth look at three effective methods of cognitive enhancement- meditation, medication, and brain-computer interfaces
